Literature.Title: Modulation of structure and antibacterial and hemolytic activity by ring size in cyclic gramicidin S analogs.

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli UB1005(MIC=16µg/ml),Escherichia coli DC2(MIC=5µg/ml),Escherichia coli SC9251(MIC=8µg/ml),Escherichia coli SC9252(MIC=9µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa H187(MIC=63µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa H188(MIC=8µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus SAP 0017(MIC=44µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus K147(MIC=66µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis(MIC=22µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=41µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis(MIC=38µg/ml),Candida albicans(MIC=16µg/ml)
